pages.content:
[HEADING] Master of Accounting
[HEADING] Make an impact today. And tomorrow.
[HEADING] Online or on-campus formats
[HEADING] Top 10 program, #1 network
[HEADING] Open to all backgrounds
[HEADING] Strong salaries, now and later
[HEADING] 98% employment, 100% greatness
[HEADING] Finish in just one year
[HEADING] I’m interested!
[HEADING] Meet someone like you.
[HEADING] Inspiring stories of student success and career ROI
[HEADING] Meet our admissions team.
[HEADING] Peek into our online classroom.
[HEADING] Discover remarkable career outcomes.
[HEADING] Upcoming Events
[HEADING] Sep 16
[HEADING] Beyond the Numbers: Accounting Careers You Didn’t Know Existed
Whether you’re starting your career, switching your career, or advancing your career, deep accounting skills and knowledge will make you an asset to any organization. If you’re driven to succeed in the business world, you’ve come to the right place.
Choose what’s best for you. Either way, you'll receive the same degree, study with the same world-class faculty, and experience the same peer-to-peer interaction.
Put the power of UNC’s alumni network, ranked #1 by LinkedIn, and powerful reputation to work for you. It matters: wherever you go, you’ll find fellow Tar Heels ready to help.
Our program welcomes students from ANY undergraduate major or professional background. Whether you’re an English major or a bank vice-president, we’re here for you.
Start your career making over $70K and grow to over $100K after 5 years. Or, build on your success, putting yourself in line for a C-suite position worth even more.
Get recruited by all of the top firms and major corporations WHILE you’re in school. Or, give your career the boost it needs by adding powerful credential to your resume.
Go from student to professional in as little as one year. And, use what you learn right away with a curriculum that connects classroom study with real-world application.
Complete the fields below. Fields marked with “*” are required.
Our admissions team regularly hosts webinars and live events. These sessions will present the significant benefits this degree unlocks as well as review the curriculum, admissions process, and application requirements for our program.
The MAC degree is offered in online and on-campus formats and both offer remarkable opportunities for peer-to-peer and peer-to-professor collaboration. How does this happen online? One of our students provides his perspective.
Our MAC program delivers a strong return on your investment. Whether you’re looking to start your career, switch careers, or advance your career, a UNC MAC degree can help you succeed in the accounting industry or the business world.
5:00 p.m. - 6:00 p.m. EST
Join the UNC Master of Accounting Program for a dynamic virtual panel featuring MAC alumni who have taken their accounting expertise into unexpected—and exciting—career paths. Whether you're curious about the versatility of an accounting degree or exploring how the MAC program can shape your future, this is your chance to hear real stories, ask questions, and be inspired.
This website uses cookies and similar technologies to understand visitor experiences. By using this website, you consent to UNC-Chapel Hill's cookie usage in accordance with their Privacy Notice.

pages.title: Master of Accounting | UNC Kenan-Flagler Business School

pages.content:
[HEADING] Our Programs
[HEADING] Undergraduate Business
[HEADING] Master of Science in Management
[HEADING] Master of Accounting
[HEADING] MBA
[HEADING] PhD
[HEADING] Executive Development
Be a part of a diverse community of goal-oriented undergraduates. Master one of the most flexible and widely applicable courses of study available. The business major and minor offer customizable, action-based learning, excellent student outcomes and access to exclusive, transformational global business programs.
In just 10 months, earn a degree designed for recent graduates with little to no work experience. This program complements your undergraduate studies, offering in-depth business knowledge and practical skills like communication, strategic thinking, and professionalism. It’s a powerful gateway to landing your dream job, providing you with the skills and expertise needed to succeed across any industry.
Join our top-ranked, available online and on campus, and open to students from all majors and professional backgrounds. Remarkable recruiting opportunities and career support for those starting out, switching careers, or advancing.
Master the skills and perspective you need for long-term career success. Apply your knowledge to hands-on, real-world learning opportunities. Strengthen your network with the best and brightest minds in business. The UNC Kenan-Flagler MBA will equip you to lead in every phase of your career.
Transform your intellectual curiosity into a meaningful, directed research program that positions you for a successful career in academia. Top-tier faculty offer collaborative mentoring to keep you moving towards your objectives. Committed resources and financial support ensure you have the tools you need to transform the field.
Partner with the experts for customized solutions for your leadership development and executive training needs. Our research-backed, practical executive training approaches for organizations and individuals ensure that you’re ready to meet the challenges ahead.

pages.title: Event Registration | Master of Accounting | UNC Kenan Flagler

pages.content:
[HEADING] Ranking and Reputation
[HEADING] We’re #1 for all the right reasons.
[HEADING] Beyond the rankings
[HEADING] 1. We connect our students with employers.
[HEADING] 2. We propel your career forward.
[HEADING] 3. No one can touch our alumni network.
[HEADING] 4. We build leaders with the soft skills employers are looking for.
[HEADING] 5. We deliver a remarkable student experience.
[HEADING] I’m interested!
[HEADING] More accolades
[HEADING] Dig Deeper.
The UNC Kenan-Flagler STEM Designated MAC program is ranked #1 according to LinkedIn’s ranking of the Best Graduate Universities for Accounting Professionals.  LinkedIn ranked universities based on “how successful recent graduates are at landing desirable Accounting jobs.” That means our alumni work at the best firms. No opinions. Just facts drawn from LinkedIn’s wealth of data.
We’re also very proud of our online format, which was recently named the #1 online Master of Accounting program by University HQ and Academic Influence. And, UNC Kenan-Flagler finished as one of the best ranked schools with an online Master of Accounting program in U.S. News & World Report‘s ranking of non-MBA online business programs. These honors reflect our commitment to delivering an online experience that closely mimics that of our top-ranked on-campus format, with world-class faculty, live classes, and a powerful curriculum.
A solid ranking is important and we’re proud to be recognized among the nation’s top programs. However, there’s more to a graduate program than its ranking. Behind the numbers, several important features tell an even richer story about our MAC program:
All of the Big 4 accounting firms as well as middle-market accounting firms and numerous major corporations recruit UNC Kenan-Flagler MAC students. Most students graduate with a signed job offer in hand. On average, 98% of our students are employed within three months of graduation.
 Find out more about our recruiting process >
For students who are working to advance their careers, we have extensive resources that help you build on your strengths. Our MAC-specific career services team provides education and guidance for students and graduates at all levels, including resume workshops, research tools, recruiting events, and customized career advising.
Learn more about career support >
Graduates of the UNC Kenan-Flagler MAC Program work everywhere: large firms and small companies, entry-level posts and executive boardrooms, close to home and coast to coast. These former students are not only shaping the accounting profession and the business world, but they’re also providing valuable advice and assistance to more recent Tar Heel graduates.
Meet some of our alumni >
We go beyond the basics. Our students develop essential business skills: communication, translation of technical concepts, influence and negotiation, problem solving and analysis, and teamwork.
Learn more about our unique curriculum >
The culture of our MAC Program is both inspiring and enjoyable. On our beautiful campus in charming Chapel Hill and through our state-of-the-art online interface, student-to-student and student-to-professor interactions are collaborative and supportive.
Hear what our students have to say >
Complete the fields below. Fields marked with “*” are required.
In addition to the accounting-specific rankings from LinkedIn and Accounting Degree Review, The Economist ranked the UNC Kenan-Flagler Business School’s alumni network #10 “based on the extent to which our students benefit from the size, global reach and helpfulness of our alumni network.” The UNC Kenan-Flagler network includes over 40,000 students and alumni living in over 80 countries worldwide.
World-class faculty
The University of Texas at Dallas rankings explore faculty research volume. In their most recent results, UNC Kenan-Flagler ranked #12 in “Accounting Faculty Research”.
Student satisfaction
In a recent survey, 96% of our students agreed with two important statements: “I am accomplishing my professional goals.” and “I would recommend the UNC MAC Program to my friends and colleagues.”
AACSB Accounting accredited
The mark of the AACSB means one thing: excellence. The UNC Master of Accounting Program has passed the rigorous criteria and standards of the AACSB accreditation board and we are proud to display their logo beside our own. Programs that bear their seal meet or exceed their strict standards of strategic management and innovation; learning and teaching; and academic and professional engagement. Whether you are considering a career in accounting, or sharpening your business skills to advance your career, choosing the UNC Master of Accounting Program means choosing excellence.
Join us as we celebrate the fascinating world of debits, credits, revenue, expenses and, of course, profit.
We regularly host webinars and live events. Ask your questions and learn more about the profession, the degree and our program.
At all levels, our graduates have achieved remarkable success in accounting roles, on finance teams, and in the business world.
This website uses cookies and similar technologies to understand visitor experiences. By using this website, you consent to UNC-Chapel Hill's cookie usage in accordance with their Privacy Notice.
• #1 “Top 50 Online Master’s Accounting Colleges of 2022” (University HQ)
• #1 “25 Best Online Master’s Degree Accounting Programs” (Academic Influence)
• #2 “Best Online Master’s in Accounting Programs in 2023” (Fortune)
• #6 “2023 U.S. News & World Report — Best Online Master’s in Business Programs” with an Online Master of Accounting Program
• #7 “Top Affordable Master’s in Accounting” (Master’s in Accounting Degrees)
• #9 “Top Master of Accounting Program for Tax Hiring” (Top in Tax)
• START/CONTINUE YOUR APPLICATION
• WHAT YOU'LL LEARN
